"Attr. Grind Your Favorite Items!":
"There are too many reckless ARKS
nowadays! It's no exaggeration to say
that he who controls attributes controls
the battlefield, but so many people just
ignore them...!
Don't neglect your weapons' attributes!
The results speak for themselves, but let
me tell you all about them nevertheless!
Now, my favourite weapon's attribute is..."

"Gunslash Zero-NT x２
Grinder x１
※1 per account, given upon acceptance"
"Perform an attribute strengthening on a weapon."
